Package com.example.matata

Class ProfileActivityTest

java.lang.Object
com.example.matata.ProfileActivityTest
public class ProfileActivityTest extends Object
Runs instrumentation tests for the ProfileActivity using AndroidJUnit4.

  • Constructor Details

    • ProfileActivityTest

      public ProfileActivityTest()

  • Method Details

    • setUp

      public void setUp()
      Sets up necessary resources before each test, including initializing Firestore and obtaining the test user ID.

    • testProfileDataLoadSuccess

      public void testProfileDataLoadSuccess()
      Tests successful loading of profile data into the UI from Firestore. Expected outcome: UI fields should match data in the Firestore document.

    • testSaveProfileData_withValidInput

      public void testSaveProfileData_withValidInput()
      Tests saving valid profile data to Firestore from the UI. Expected outcome: Firestore document should reflect the updated values.

    • testProfilePictureUpload

      public void testProfilePictureUpload()
      Tests the profile picture upload functionality by verifying that a drawable is set on the ImageView.

    • testFacilityFieldsVisible_whenOrganizerSwitchIsChecked

      public void testFacilityFieldsVisible_whenOrganizerSwitchIsChecked()
      Tests that facility fields become visible when the organizer switch is checked. Expected outcome: Organizer fields should be visible when switch is enabled.

    • testAdminViewStartsAdminActivity

      public void testAdminViewStartsAdminActivity()
      Tests that enabling the admin view switch triggers an intent to start the AdminView activity.

    • testUpdateProfileData_andVerifyWithDatabase

      public void testUpdateProfileData_andVerifyWithDatabase()
      Tests updating profile data in the UI and verifying the changes in Firestore. Expected outcome: Firestore document should reflect the updated profile data.

    • testFacilityProfileUpload_andVerifyWithDatabase

      public void testFacilityProfileUpload_andVerifyWithDatabase()
      Tests saving facility profile data in Firestore and verifying the stored data. Expected outcome: Firestore document should contain the correct facility profile information.

    • testInitialProfileDataLoad

      public void testInitialProfileDataLoad() throws InterruptedException
      Tests loading initial profile data into the UI from Firestore, verifying that default values are correctly displayed. Expected outcome: UI fields should match the initialized Firestore document values.
      Throws:
      InterruptedException
